privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy and data security are fundamental to our assessment platform. Learn how we protect and handle your information.

secure.title: Secure Data Handling
secure.description: All assessment data is encrypted and stored securely

anonymous.title: Anonymous Responses
anonymous.description: Individual responses are anonymized for privacy protection

minimization.title: Data Minimization
minimization.description: We collect only what's necessary for assessments

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have full control over your personal data

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.p1: Tenadam Training, Consultancy & Research PLC ("we," "our," or "us") operates the Assessment Hub platform (the "Service"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our organizational assessment platform.
introduction.p2: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy applies to all users of our assessment platform, including administrators, facilitators, and assessment participants.

personal.title: 2.1 Personal Information
items: Account Information: Name, email address, organization affiliation, role
Contact Information: Business address, phone number (for administrators)
Authentication Data: Login credentials and access keys
Profile Information: Job title, department, assessment preferences

assessment.title: 2.2 Assessment Data
items: Response Data: Assessment answers and scores (anonymized for individual responses)
Metadata: Assessment completion times, progress tracking
Aggregate Data: Group statistics and organizational insights
Consent Records: Your agreement to participate in assessments

technical.title: 2.3 Technical Information
items: Usage Data: Platform interactions, feature usage, session duration
Device Information: Browser type, operating system, IP address (hashed)
Log Data: System logs, error reports, performance metrics

primary.title: 3.1 Primary Purposes
items: Provide and maintain our assessment platform services
Process and analyze assessment responses for organizational insights
Generate reports and analytics for authorized users
Manage user accounts and access permissions
Ensure platform security and prevent fraud

secondary.title: 3.2 Secondary Purposes
items: Improve our platform functionality and user experience
Conduct research and development for assessment methodologies
Provide customer support and technical assistance
Comply with legal obligations and regulatory requirements

withinOrg.title: 4.1 Within Your Organization
withinOrg.p1: Assessment results are shared only with authorized personnel within your organization, such as administrators and designated facilitators. Individual responses remain anonymous unless explicitly consented otherwise.

serviceProviders.title: 4.2 Service Providers
serviceProviders.p1: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist in platform operations, including cloud hosting, data analytics, and customer support. All service providers are bound by strict confidentiality agreements.

legal.title: 4.3 Legal Requirements
legal.p1: We may disclose information when required by law, legal process, or to protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users or the public.

security.title: 5. Data Security
measures: End-to-end encryption for data transmission and storage
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Secure data centers with physical and logical security
Employee training on data protection best practices
security.p1: While we implement industry-standard security measures, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We continuously work to improve our security practices and respond to emerging threats.

periods.title: 6.1 Retention Periods
items: Account Information: Retained while your account is active and for 3 years after closure
Assessment Data: Retained for 7 years for research and organizational analysis
Technical Logs: Retained for 1 year for security and performance monitoring
Communication Records: Retained for 3 years for customer support purposes

deletion.title: 6.2 Data Deletion
deletion.p1: Upon request or account closure, we will delete your personal information within 30 days, except where retention is required by law or for legitimate business purposes.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Privacy Rights

access.title: Access & Portability
access.description: Request a copy of your personal data and assessment results

correction.title: Correction
correction.description: Update or correct inaccurate personal information

deletion.title: Deletion
deletion.description: Request deletion of your personal data

restriction.title: Restriction
restriction.description: Limit how we process your personal information

yourRights.p1: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@tenadamconsulting.com. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

essential.title: 8.1 Essential Cookies
essential.p1: We use essential cookies for platform functionality, authentication, and security. These cookies are necessary for the platform to operate properly.

analytics.title: 8.2 Analytics Cookies
analytics.p1: We use analytics cookies to understand platform usage and improve user experience. These cookies collect aggregated, anonymized data.

management.title: 8.3 Cookie Management
management.p1: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling essential cookies may affect platform functionality.

transfers.title: 9. International Data Transfers
transfers.p1: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for international transfers, including standard contractual clauses and adequacy decisions.

children.title: 10. Children's Privacy
children.p1: Our platform is designed for organizational use and is not intended for individuals under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. Your continued use of the platform after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.address1: Address: Tenadam Training, Consultancy & Research PLC
contact.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are committed to addressing your concerns and ensuring your privacy rights are respected.
